about.summary: A Python library for automating interaction with websites

name: mechanicalsoup
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "0.6.0" %}

package:
  name: mechanicalsoup
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: mechanicalSoup-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/hickford/MechanicalSoup/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8d7b00a8a56b2b527d5a338bb0b2ba74044d29fd3b84a6f3aa8521e208d4c850

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - requests >=2.0
    - beautifulsoup4
    - six >=1.4

test:
  imports:
    - mechanicalsoup

about:
  home: https://github.com/hickford/MechanicalSoup
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'A Python library for automating interaction with websites'
  license_family: MIT

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ocefpaf
